about.description: I'm from Tucuman, Argentina. When I started my university stage I signed up for a degree in systems engineering to be able to understand and learn more about the IT world. Very convinced that my focus was more to programming, I decided to give my life that direction and I started studying web development until I graduated as a fullstack developer. I am a programmer looking for a work team to be able to apply my knowledge, gain experience, learn much more and grow professionally in this career.

projects.Movye: Web application to search movies, order and filter them. It also allows you to add movies to favorites and watchlist. Used technologies: Next.js and styled components.
projects.Arthub: An e-commerce for selling work of art. It was done in a group, using the SCRUM methodology. Used technologies: React, Redux, Express, Sequelize, Firebase, PostgreSQL and authentication with JWT.
projects.Memotest: Classic memotest game, with the possibility of choosing 2 themes. Used technologies: typescript and styled components
projects.PI - Dogs: Fullstack single project. It consists of an application that shows information on all breeds, it is also possible to create new breeds. Used technologies: React, Redux, Express, Sequelize and PostgreSQL.
projects.App-Clima: Web application made with React. It allows you to search for weather data from any city in the world.
